title: MetaDogWorld
content:
Event time: 22/06/2022 - 21/07/2022


Buy 15 S Heroes (from Shop) will get 1 Trial NFT of MetaDogWorld.

You can use this Trial NFT in MetaDogWorld game.

The Trial NFT will let you earn up to 4 BUSD and then it will no longer be used.

title: AETHR World
content:
Event time: July 7th, 2022 - August 4th, 2022


Buy 15 S Heroes (from Shop) will get 1 Hero Box of AETHR World.

You can open this Hero Box to get 1 Hero and use it in AETHR World game, or you can sell it on AETHR's Marketplace.

Total Hero Boxes of this event: 5000.

title: Gunfire AVAX
content:
Event time: August 11th, 2022


Buy 15 S Heroes (from Shop) will get 1 NFT of Gunfire Avax.

There is no need to buy 15 Heroes at once, just buy 15 Hero S during the event.

Each user can only receive 1 NFT Gunfire Avax for the duration of the event.

Total Hero Boxes of this event: 5000.
